summary: if the most recent episode of GoT disappointed (read: fucking traumatized) you, please cheer yourself up by imagining Charlie...
body: if the most recent episode of GoT disappointed (read: fucking traumatized) you, please cheer yourself up by imagining Charlie Weasley watching the show. like, maybe Harry, who doesn’t really have time to watch TV, mentions to him in passing that there’s a new muggle show with dragons in it and Charlie just. like. loses his shit. Frantically getting his dad to help him get cable (neither of them has any clue how to do this so Hermione, faintly amused, lends a hand) so he can watch. and then imagine his gradual indignation, replaced by pure fury, when Dany’s dragons are NOTHING like REAL dragons who are PURE and GOOD and need to be treated with caution and respect and not allowed to just roam around or be LOCKED in a DUNGEON MERLIN‘S PANTS WHAT WAS SHE THINKING and just. the whole family having to listen to him rant about it. Harry has still never seen an episode. George buys Charlie Targaryen merch for Christmas. Ginny is having the time of her life.

Harry has still never seen an episode. George buys Charlie Targaryen merch for Christmas. Ginny is having the time of her life.

Frantically getting his dad to help him get cable (neither of them has any clue how to do this so Hermione, faintly amused, lends a hand) so he can watch. and then imagine his gradual indignation, replaced by pure fury, when Dany’s dragons are NOTHING like REAL dragons who are PURE and GOOD and need to be treated with caution and respect and not allowed to just roam around or be LOCKED in a DUNGEON MERLIN‘S PANTS WHAT WAS SHE THINKING and just. the whole family having to listen to him rant about it. summary: Can you do #19 cause I can't think of a way to make it innocent😅
question: Can you do #19 cause I can't think of a way to make it innocent😅
answer:
Hi! I couldn’t either but this morning I had a revelation so here it is before I forget! Thanks for the ask! ❤️

Harry: What are you doing?

Draco: I always need to be gagged for this

Harry: Why?

Draco: Thay bitch is going to pluck my eyebrows hairs one by one and it’s very painful! I scream a lot!

Harry: Don’t do it then

Draco: And look like a caveman like you do? I prefer the pain, thanks

summary: During HBP
title: During HBP
body:
Harry watching Ginny and Dean whisper: *internally* They’re probably planning their wedding together.

Meanwhile Ginny (sighing): I really don’t want to know how cute Seamus looked today.

Dean (scoffing): He didn’t look cute! He looked gorgeous! Get your facts right!

Ginny:

summary:
infinite arms, active marauder era rpg

 James Potter is dead. Countless others have met the same fate at the wands of the...
caption:
infinite arms, active marauder era rpg

James Potter is dead. Countless others have met the same fate at the wands of the Death Eaters. The war in full swing it seems there is no end in sight.

Hogwarts has been shut down indefinitely. But when will the school reopen? Dumbledore is making strides to rebuild the venerable building but can students really be called safe after yet another attack on the school? The situation in the United Kingdom has become increasingly dire as death seems to stalk any who dare speak out against the Dark Lord.

That is not to say that the Ministry is not fighting back. The leaders in the DMLE have formed a clandestine alliance with the Order and they have worked together to raid Death Eater strongholds and face down their attacks.

This war has been fought in the shadows can no longer be hidden. Can this wave of darkness be stopped or will those who resist be swept away?

canon list | face claim | requests | our discord

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: maybeshesnaped
blog.title: 𝑽𝒖𝒍𝒏𝒆𝒓𝒂 𝑺𝒂𝒏𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒖𝒓
blog.description:
| Snape is my son and Alan is my father |
sninsta: @thatbastardrickman

summary: “I was under the impression,” said Snape, “that Alecto had apprehended an intruder.” “Really?” said Professor McGonagall. “And...
body:
“I was under the impression,” said Snape, “that Alecto had apprehended an intruder.” “Really?” said Professor McGonagall. “And what gave you that impression?” Snape made a slight flexing movement of his left arm, where the Dark Mark was branded into his skin. Oh, but naturally,” said Professor McGonagall. “You Death Eaters have your own private means of communication, I forgot.”

This scene is special to me. Snape, almost in a guilty way, moves his arm to suggest the Dark Mark is the way he knows what Alecto is up to. This is such a vulnerable, painful moment to go through. Here’s a man, looking at his colleague, someone who used to trust him but now thinks the worst of him, and he’s dying to let her know he’s not with them. He didn’t kill Dumbledore for Voldemort. He’s still with her ; with the Order. But he can’t.

The trust of Minerva McGonagall must have been one of Snape’s most painful sacrifices. Rowling’s choice to have him indicate his Dark Mark with a gesture rather than acknowledge it with words makes him seem suddenly younger and vulnerable. The flexing of an arm reminds us of his physical existence again; it’s a gesture both masculine and intimate. He is less the imposing Death Eater here than a lone man, wanting the comfort, just for a moment, of his former friend thinking about how it’s felt for him to know every pulse of evil for the past several years in his own flesh.

(From Lorrie Kim’s “Snape: A Definitive Reading”)

Snape with this gesture almost tells her he’s ashamed of being associated with the Death Eaters. The Dark Mark is there, and he hints at it, rather than proudly flaunt it, or state that he knows what Alecto’s been doing simply because they’re fellow DE. He’s alone with her in that corridor (or so he thinks so) and he remembers how they’ve been alone before, but as friends; as fighters of the same cause, rather than enemies like they are now. And he just wishes he could tell her the truth.

body:
Sirius: Urg! I can’t study anymore!

James: Pads, it’s been 20 minutes.

blog.name: princeanderfels
blog.title: Fear Me
blog.description:
Hi! I'm Owyn. I'm aResident Assistant /nonbinary / Graphic Design Student/ activist/Disabled and in Chronic Pain. I have a Service Dog named Lexi and she helps me with my Mental Health mostly, but also a lot of Physical Stuff. 
I genuinely swear all the time. please don't follow me if this is upsetting to you because I do not tag for curse words. I live in Seattle and I'm mostly just really sad. 
use whatever pronouns feel right in your heart

summary: The thing that really pisses me off is that Potter is coded to be the "hero" but it's rarely addressed how he is often not held...
body:
The thing that really pisses me off is that Potter is coded to be the “hero” but it’s rarely addressed how he is often not held accountable for his actions. McGonagall is the only one who seems to have a grasp of balance when disciplining the children at school. Snape is extremely harsh, Lupin is shown as favoring Harry, as is Lockhart, Crouch tries to kill him, but is, honestly the next closest to being fair with him and of course Umbridge is a fucking worm. Dumbledore, however, is the biggest issue. He lets Harry get away with so much when it comes to rewarding him for being a rule breaker. There was no need for Harry to go to the 3rd floor. Quirrel couldn’t get past the Mirror of Erised. He was extremely arrogant to think this way, but in the end, rather than being punished for endangering themselves and other students, the trio is rewarded. And it was only luck that let him survive the Basilisk, of course he needed to be the one down there, but bringing one teacher along, who is admitted to not actually be able to anything out of spite is some how commendable

People talk about how Draco snape bully, but never how, from Draco’s perspective Harry could be as well. They use Polyjuice potion to spy on him. Every single time something goes wrong at the school Harry blames Draco. Harry pushes their rivalry along as well.

Anyway, that’s my Ted Talk on how Harry is a deeply flawed person and the adults in his life are terrible people (except for McGonagall who is an angel)

Snape is extremely harsh, Lupin is shown as favoring Harry, as is Lockhart, Crouch tries to kill him, but is, honestly the next closest to being fair with him and of course Umbridge is a fucking worm. Quirrel couldn’t get past the Mirror of Erised. He was extremely arrogant to think this way, but in the end, rather than being punished for endangering themselves and other students, the trio is rewarded. summary:
Draco: Just fo your information, my birthday is next month
Harry: I know
Draco: I thought you needed a reminder
Harry: You've...
body:
Draco: Just fo your information, my birthday is next month
Harry: I know
Draco: I thought you needed a reminder
Harry: You've telling me that since January and you've been leaving pics of the things you want me to buy you in all the house, I think I won't forget
Draco: Be careful later in the shower. I left there a postcard with a pic of Prague in it

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
